column3: I'd prefer if that was done during `initialize_datadir`, so you could remove it here as well: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blame/1807dd13633ff9c7fe00f8727b9c628cbc144595/test/functional/test_framework/test_node.py#L85
